hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hamzah bin 'Amr that he said to the Messenger of Allah:"I feel able to fast while traveling; is there any sin on me?" He said: "It is a concession from Allah, the mighty and sublime, so whoever accepts it has done well, and whoever wants to fast, there is no sin on him

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى عُرْوَةَ فِي حَدِيثِ حَمْزَةَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences Reported from 'Urwah in the Narration of Hamzah about it
